title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7002.6 - Medical screening
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7002.6 - Medical screening

State Regulations
A medical screening questionnaire shall be administered
by facility staff at the time of admission or prior to the placement of a
prisoner in a facility housing unit. Notes
